long context::rip

Definition at line 56 of file kernel.h.

struct { ... } context::integer_registers

Stores all user visible integer registers.

The segment registers are not stored as the user mode processes can only use a code and a data segment descriptor. We assume that the cs is set to the code and all the rest of the segment registers are set to the data segment all the time.
